QuestData.Title: The Fate of Morbent Fel
QuestData.Description: Before I was lost to the woods, the last thing I remember is Morbent Fel. He was a vile necromancer, and the reason this land swarms with so many vile undead.$B$BI asked an adventurer to help me put an end to him. I thought they did! But Sister Elsington tells me the land still crawls with ghouls and spectres ripped from the grave.$B$BMorbent Fel should have breathed his last in the house on Forlorn Rowe, north of Raven Hill Cemetery. Go there and see what's become of him...
QuestData.LogDescription: Search Forlorn Rowe for signs of Morbent Fel.
QuestData.RewardText: His clothes and bloodstains? If it's not tricks, it's something worse...
